name: User logs in to the Relying Party using EUDI Wallet
scenarioId: android/RQES_R4_RP_QTSP_centric_flow_28/Authenticate_to_Relying_Party_R4_100/authenticateToRelyingParty:User logs in to the Relying Party using EUDI Wallet
methodName: User logs in to the Relying Party using EUDI Wallet

testSteps.description: Given the user has a valid EUDI Wallet on their mobile device
And the user has issued a PID attestation to the EUDI Wallet
And the user has internet connectivity
Given the user visits the Relying Party login page on a different device than EUDI Wallet
When the user enters the username & password
And the user clicks on the Login button
Then the user should be successfully logged in to the Relying Party
And the user can proceed with the signature process

userStory.storyName: EUDI Wallet User Logs into a Relying Party
userStory.displayName: EUDI Wallet User Logs into a Relying Party
userStory.narrative:
As a EUDI Wallet User
  I want to use my EUDI Wallet to log in to a Relying Party
  so that I can access the services provided by the Relying Party.

title: User logs in to the Relying Party using EUDI Wallet
